content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Not too cryptic for a Reverse, and fun besides. Good work!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: During a clash-streak it is nice to encounter an easy one now and then. Given that it was the creator's aim to create an easy clash for beginners, descriptions & cases are clear and it is certainly doable in 5 minutes (python 20 seconds), this clash checks the boxes.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good fun clash. Easier for Python-users than in other languages, but still good.

Neat.

It is a nice clash, but maybe a bit easy.

In comparison to your Javascript Solution, my solution is in Python.

```
string = input()
print(string.swapcase()[::-1])
```

The idea is simple, which is good and all, I am just stating it for how I see it.


Constraints:
*Please add a constraint specifying the maximum length of the input [[string]]. Example below:
```
0 < length of [[string]] <= max length
```

Other than that, good clash.
Well suited to all three modes and clear statements and test-cases.

Please add the constraint, and I will consider promoting my upvote into an approval.
If @5DN1L has any other advice, please follow it closely.

Thanks and happy coding!
Code-Parser

Your contribution has been uploaded twice. Please remove one of them. The other link is:
https://www.codingame.com/contribute/view/854855458616bee45470631c57ebfebbc5ba2

Thanks.
CodinGame gave me an error (524) when I first attempted to upload the contribution. So I tried again. Turns out it did work the first time.

Thank you for your feedback! I do understand that this clash is possibly a bit too easy.

My main goal was to create a simple clash for beginners.

People who chose to solve clashes in Python will have an advantage in most situations. Picking the right language is also part of the game in my opinion.

Again, thank you for your feedback! I have added the constraint.
